title: Left Right Arrow

adjectives: Perpendicular to the vertical; parallel to the plane of the horizon; level, flat.
Parallel to or in the plane of the horizon or a base line
Parallel to or in the plane of the horizon or a base line.
Parallel to the plane of the horizon.
nouns: A perceptible indication of something not immediately apparent (as a visible clue that something has happened)
A perceptible indication of something not immediately apparent, as a visible clue that something has happened.
A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description: A horizontal line with arrowheads on both ends, pointing left and right.
apple_vendor_description: The left-right arrow emoji on Apple devices is a bold, clear indicator of directionality and choice. Rendered with Apple's characteristic sharp lines and smooth, matte finish, it appears sturdy and definitive, with subtle shading that gives it a slight 3D presence. This versatile emoji, symbolizing movement in both directions, agreement, or a balanced perspective, is a fundamental tool for navigation and communication within Apple's digital interfaces.
